derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French humilite, from Latin humilitas, from humilis (see humble)

entry.def: Someone who has humility is not proud and does not believe they are better than other people.

example.ex: For a long time he still thought like a millionaire but he has humility now.
example.tran: 在很长一段时间里，他仍以一个百万富翁的方式思维，但他现在变得谦恭了。

means.word_mean: 1. a disposition to be humble; a lack of false pride;

sentences.sentence: "not everyone regards humility as a virtue"
"he was filled with humility at the sight of the Pope"

auth_sentence.content: What humanity needs is some good old fashioned humility.
auth_sentence.res_content: What humanity needs is some good old fashioned humility.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What humanity needs is some good old fashioned humility.

auth_sentence.content: Plus her humility or modesty makes her less threatening.

stems_affixes.word_buile: hum土,地+an表名词和形容词,人→传说中人是土造出来的
human[adj.人的,人类的 n.人]+e→有人情的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 谦卑的,恭顺的;地位低下的
充满潮湿的, 湿润的, 多湿气的

stems_affixes.word_buile: non非+human人的,人类的→adj.非人类的
post后+hum土+ous……的→入土表示死→死后的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 非人类的,无人类属性的
stems_affixes.word_buile: un非+human人的,人类的→adj.非人类的,无人类属性的
hum土,地+an表名词和形容词,人→传说中人是土造出来的
humid湿润的+ity表名词→n.湿气,湿度
humiliate[v.使羞辱,使丢脸[同]]+ion表名词→n.羞辱, 蒙耻
hum土,地+ility=ity状态→接近地面的状态→低下的状态
hum土,地+iliate=ate使……→使接近地面,使低下→使丢脸

sentences.en: Humility often gains more than pride.
sentences.cn: 谦逊往往比骄傲收益更多。
